text: 12:33 Matyu 19:21; Luk 18:22; Aposel 2:45; 4:34Ia uan biziba amangɨva dagɨaba inigh, egh gumazamizir onganarazibar anɨng. Egh uari bagh dagɨaba azuir mɨtariba inigh dar arightɨma da dɨghoran kogham. Ian bizir aghuir Godɨn Nguibamɨn itiba, da gɨvaghan kogham. Godɨn nguibamɨn okɨmakɨar gumaziba roghɨra izan kogham, eghtɨ barareba dagh asɨghasɨghan kogham.
